com.viaoa.object

Class OAObjectHubDelegate

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.viaoa.object.OAObjectHubDelegate

  • public class OAObjectHubDelegate
extends Object
    Used by Hub to manage the list of Hubs that an OAObject is a member of.
    Author:
    vincevia

      removed 20180613 // note: need to use HubDataDelegate.contains(..) instead, since a certain type of hub wont be stored in obj.weakrefs public static boolean isInHub(OAObject oaObj, Hub hub) { if (oaObj == null || hub == null) return false; WeakReference>[] refs = oaObj.weakhubs; int cnt = 0; for (int i = 0; refs != null && i < refs.length; i++) { WeakReference wr = refs[i]; if (wr != null && wr.get() == hub) return true; } return false; }

        removed 20180613 // note: need to use HubDataDelegate.contains(..) instead, since a certain type of hub wont be stored in obj.weakrefs public static boolean isInHub(OAObject oaObj, Hub hub) { if (oaObj == null || hub == null) return false; WeakReference>[] refs = oaObj.weakhubs; int cnt = 0; for (int i = 0; refs != null && i < refs.length; i++) { WeakReference wr = refs[i]; if (wr != null && wr.get() == hub) return true; } return false; }
